txt.en:
'[placeholder], I have a vital task for you. Drûmaudhul is a lumber-camp used by the Orcs of Moria to prepare their siege-engines. We need to remove this threat from the borders of Lothlórien.

'Go to Drûmaudhul and defeat any enemies you find there. This encampment is one of the largest in Fanuidhol and should not be approached lightly.

'The encampment lies to the north-west, beyond Golugrak and Gazpush. Return to me if you should succeed.'
'Ha! That should hinder Mazog's efforts for a while.\n\n'It is a victory, [placeholder], but I fear a temporary one.'
'Drûmaudhul supplies the Orcs of Moria with the wood they need to build their siege-engines...the encampment must be razed, [placeholder].'
The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothlórien.
Drûmaudhul lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.\n\nBelegoth has asked you to attack Drûmaudhul and defeat any enemies you find there.
Talk to Belegoth at Talan Gwilith
Belegoth is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Drûmaudhul.\n\nYou should return to Belegoth with the tidings of your victory at Drûmaudhul.
